name: CT Contact
author: Chris Robinson

sections.description: Want to display your personal or business contact information? Then this awesome lil’ contact widget plugin is for you. It includes Title, Company, Street, City, State, Postal, Country, Email & a View More Link.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the /ct-contact/ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the CT Contact plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Configure your settings via Appearance > Widgets > CT Contact.
  4. And you’re good to go!

short_description: Want to display your personal or business contact information? Then this awesome lil' contact widget plugin is for you.
